[ComputeRows](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/783d80d6567cebb1d350296145a87f311acfb38f/deps/opende/src/quickstep.cpp?at=default#cl-491)
Actually myself is not sure to say whether it is intentional, see the `ComputeRows` function with the link in the *default* repo,  I might just follow what ComputeRows( ) does for function with *very* long parameter, especially those with `#ifdef` MACROS. I think we should agree on a style for this case. I am not consistent
